name: Halaster Horror
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The Halaster horror has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spell Immunity
entries: The Halaster horror is immune to three spells chosen by its creator. Typical immunities include {@spell fireball}, {@spell heat metal}, and {@spell lightning bolt}.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The Halaster horror makes two staff attacks.

actions.name: Staff
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage.
